title: 23a02 - Shopping news publication.
text:
A publication, usually referred to as
a shopping news or guide, which contains some news even though small in amount
and some advertising copy is considered a newspaper within the meaning of Sec
13(a)(8).
html: A publication, usually referred to as a shopping news or guide, which contains some news even though small in amount and some advertising copy is considered a newspaper within the meaning of Sec 13(a)(8).
